analysis.description:
WheelOf0xBitcoin._finishSpin (/unique_chucks/4/0x656038e97cee7c095673f7b9fad695b323a6f098.sol#434-503) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- result == 0
	- result == 1
	- result == 2
	- result == 3
	- result == 4
	- result == 5
	- result == 6
	- result == 7
	- result == 8
	- result == 9

Reentrancy in WheelOf0xBitcoin._finishSpin (/unique_chucks/4/0x656038e97cee7c095673f7b9fad695b323a6f098.sol#434-503):
	External calls:
	- win(_customerAddress,returnedAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x656038e97cee7c095673f7b9fad695b323a6f098.sol#487-488)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- playerSpins (/unique_chucks/4/0x656038e97cee7c095673f7b9fad695b323a6f098.sol#499-503)

WheelOf0xBitcoin.depositAndSpin uses tx.origin for authorization:
